name: The University Semester Assistant
description: Organize all your university semester in a single Notion templateHave you always struggled to organize your semester at college or university? Do you forget deadlines and assignments, or feel hard to stay up to date with your exercises? Use this Notion University Semester Assistant to help you to manage your courses, plan your tasks and take your notes. With this template, you will finally manage to skyrocket your university journey!What you will get:a space to manage your courses and their corr
features: a space to manage your courses and their corresponding tasks and notes; a space to track the upcoming tasks you will need to achieve; a complete tutorial sheet on how to use this template
